ca.cs.ualberta.localpost.model

Class CommentModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • ca.cs.ualberta.localpost.model.CommentModel
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ChildCommentModel, RootCommentModel

    public abstract class CommentModel
extends java.util.Observable
    This class is the base abstract class for our comment models. It hold all the attributes a comment should have, as well as the proper setters and getters
    Author:
    Team 01

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CommentModel()
      Basic constructor that was used for testing purposes
      CommentModel(java.lang.String content, android.location.Location location, android.graphics.Bitmap picture)
      Final constructor that will be used once location and pictures are added to our comments known error : title needs to be added as a parameter
      CommentModel(java.lang.String content, java.lang.String title)
      Basic constructor that assigns the base values for a comment except for the content and title which are parameters that passed in.

      • CommentModel

        public CommentModel(java.lang.String content,
            java.lang.String title)
        Basic constructor that assigns the base values for a comment except for the content and title which are parameters that passed in.
        Parameters:
        content - : represents the content of the comment
        title - : represents the title of a comment

      • CommentModel

        public CommentModel(java.lang.String content,
            android.location.Location location,
            android.graphics.Bitmap picture)
        Final constructor that will be used once location and pictures are added to our comments known error : title needs to be added as a parameter
        Parameters:
        content - : represents the content of the comment
        location - : is the location the comment was made from or said to be made from by the user
        picture - : is the picture that is attached to the comment
